storyInfo: Orchid receives a special clothing design order, and she realizes during its production that it's not nearly as simple to make as she expected.

attributes.content: Monday
Agh... Look at the time... Who's knocking on my door this early in the morning...?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Coming, coming. Just a moment.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you, Orchid.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: You are...?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: My name is Jerry. One of my... relations, is a patient aboard the ship.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Hello, Jerry. Do you need something from me?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: A wedding dress! I would like to ask you to make a wedding dress! Please, I beg you!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: You want me to make a wedding dress? I'm afraid you're asking the wrong person. I just edited a fashion magazine.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Besides, we'll be stopping at a city for resupplies next month. You can visit a high-end tailor shop while we're there.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But Dr. Warfarin said that Penny might not make it through the month... We probably can't wait till then.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: I'm sorry to hear that. I didn't know.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I realize I probably sound pushy, but you're the only one I can turn to.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Are you really sure about this? I do know a thing or two about fashion design, but I'm not a professional designer. The wedding dress might not be exactly what you're looking for.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Besides, we don't have a very wide variety of fabric onboard. I'll be limited in what I can use to design your dress, and it may not come out looking perfect.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Right, I understand. We don't have any wild expectations. Penny and I will be more than happy just to get a decent enough wedding dress.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: *Sigh*, if you really don't mind, I can help you with this.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: May I see Penny, then? I need to take her measurements before I work.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Considering Penny's situation... I guess we could, if you'll just be measuring.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Will tomorrow work?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Yes. Remember to send me the room number. I'll be there at 2 P.M. sharp.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Thank you, Orchid.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Alright, now go back and stay with your fiancée.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: See you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Tuesday
Rhodes Island Hospital Room
Alright, good job. That wraps it up with the measurements. Now, let's help you lie down. Slowly.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Thank you very much, Orchid. *Cough*. He went straight to you without telling me anything.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. It's the least I can do. You're looking pretty good. I can see that he takes care of you.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Right, ever since I got sick, things have been as difficult on him as they have been on me. I know how taxing it must be to keep taking care of me like he does.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: No, not at all, Penny. I'm not tired!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Jerry, could you bring me a bowl of vegetable soup from the cafeteria? I'm really craving some right now.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Yes, of course. I'll be right back!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Jerry, slow down... Uh, never mind.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Orchid, let's talk more about the wedding dress, *cough*...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Right, I brought some catalogs with me. Take a look and see if there's anything in here that you like.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: They're gorgeous, and extravagant... Did you design all these?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Of course not. They're classics by famous designers from all over the world. I can make a dress for you based on these styles.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But I want to see your own designs. May I?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Sorry, Penny. Jerry might not have told you, but I was just the editor of a fashion magazine. I don't have any designs of my own to show.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But I touched the callus on your purlicue just now. Calluses this thick only come from the big scissors that tailors use.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: You've got an eye for detail, Penny.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I did work in design before, but I didn't do a very good job at it. That's why I chose to leave that line of work in the end.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: No way. You have very good taste.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Design calls for more than good taste.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Back when I was still in fashion school, my instructor Boyd once told me that my work lacked spirit. He suggested I find another career, said my lack of spirit would only be a waste of a life.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: He didn't mean my life, but the collective lives of my customers.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: He sounds like a spiteful man who can't hold his tongue. *Cough*. You shouldn't have let him get to you.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Absolutely. He's an annoying man, but he's also one of Columbia's most famous designers. I really respected him at the time.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: That's why I had a breakdown. I couldn't keep at it anymore, so I submitted the paperwork to change my major to art history.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: And you were really okay with that?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: That's not important, Penny.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: *cough*, to tell you the truth, I really am not worried about you wasting my life.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: So why don't you give it a try?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: It takes a lot more time to design a wedding dress than normal clothing. If something gets in my way, it might hold up your wedding.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I'm sorry if I'm being difficult, Orchid, but please think of it as my dying wish.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: *Sigh*, fine. I'll make you a wedding dress, one for you and you alone.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: So please forget what that old man said to you all those years ago, *cough*.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Alright, can we talk more tomorrow, no, the next couple of days? I need to learn more about you and your fiancé too.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Of course. There's no hurry. You... *cough* *cough*... you can come talk to me anytime.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Okay, then. I'll work on a rough design based on your specs. Once I'm done with that, I'll come talk to you before I finalize it. Try to get some rest now.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: *Cough*... See you.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Alright. There's our rough design. Let's see...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: *Sigh*... This girl is way too thin. She's practically a skeleton. I'll have to give her some puffier sleeves and skirt to make her look less skinny.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, darling, which material should we use? Organza? Chiffon? Maybe satin...?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Inspiration... Where are you when I need you the most?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: (Picks up the wooden puppets on the table and knocks them together lightly)
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: *Sigh*... What's your story anyway?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Wednesday
Penny and I met in Siesta. There's a really famous beach there with milk white sand. Uh, at the time, I was getting drinks for me and the boys, and my eyes landed on her when I turned around.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: It was crowded, but I noticed her right away. The setting sun was slowly sinking into the sea, dying its waters yellow, and the sky...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: The sky was pink. It was magnificent and beautiful. Everyone at the beach was gasping in awe or taking pictures, but not me.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: I just kept looking at her.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Siesta... What is Siesta like? Maybe I should give Ceylon a call.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Hello, Ceylon? Sorry for calling you at this hour.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: So, I remember you're from Siesta.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: No, nothing happened. I just wanted to ask if you had any pictures or videos of the Siestan seascape that I could use as a reference.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Okay, thank you. I'll come pick it up tomorrow.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Thursday.
*Cough*, someone had just thrown beer in my face... I turned around and found a giddy boy giggling at me. I could only smile back awkwardly. Then... *cough*... what happened next was really weird.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: He came up to me and asked if I wanted to see some hydrangeas.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: *Cough*... I've had guys hit on me with worse pick-up lines, and he was stammering all the way...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Hnn—But I took him up on it.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: We visited the most beautiful garden I'd ever seen. There were these small balls of flowers packed together. All of which he cared for himself... *cough*.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Up until then, I had never seen so many colorful hydrangeas.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Sorry, Lena, but would it be okay if I come pick some hydrangeas at your greenhouse this weekend?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Sorry, Orchid, but I'm running low on hydrangeas this month, and I need them for my perfumes... Mind if I ask what you need them for?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Do you know about Penny at the ICU?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: She and her fiancé are getting married in her room this weekend. You know what bad shape she's in. There's only so much we can do with the venue, but I want to try to decorate it as best I can.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, that girl? It's true, things aren't looking very bright for her. She might... Never mind. Can you come fetch them tomorrow?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Of course. Will eight o'clock in the evening do?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Of course. You should take care of yourself too and get some rest. You don't seem very well lately.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You're right... design work is exhausting... Anyway, thank you, Lena.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Friday
She told you about the hydrangeas, right? She probably told you about the scissors, too.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: A lot of people think my hobbies, gardening and papercutting, are a little... how should I say this... unmanly, right.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: But Penny doesn't think so. She actually likes them. Sometimes we sit in the garden together for a whole day just cutting a single piece of paper into different shapes.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: She's very good at it. Not so clumsy like me.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Sorry, Orchid. I caught a cold a couple days ago. If it wasn't for that, I would've helped you out.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Here are the laces you asked for. I got them from back home. They're all handmade and easy on the skin. Not too prickly.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: They feel very different to the touch. Thanks.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, right, I have a question I want to ask you. Let's say I wanted to add some elements of papercutting to the design. How would you trim the dress?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Do you have a design drawing? Let me see...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Here you go. Thanks for your help.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Saturday
*Cough*... Jerry sold the house to pay for my treatment...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I wonder... how the garden is doing... *cough*. Without anyone taking care of the flowers, they probably all withered.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: The days we spent cutting paper together... were quiet and carefree. Too bad... those days are behind us...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Back then... we would even play games... *cough*...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: *Cough*... Jerry didn't know how to play very well, so I helped him...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: What a dummy I was... *cough*... Who'll play with him now...?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: (Why did I accept his proposal...?)
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: The hydrangea patch on the chest... there we go. Sew it on... perfect.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: The dip dyed skirt... Hm... is this too light of a shade? Let me take a look from a little farther away.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: No, this is just the right shade of blue.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Man, this skirt looks just like a hollowed-out papercutting. Bibeak's a genius.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Okay, darling... I'm quite fond of you.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I hope Penny will like you, too.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Monday
Right now, slowly...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Thank you, Orchid.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Phew... Okay. It's a good thing I made it with buttons up front instead of fastening in the back.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: It's beautiful... Thank you. Just looking at it... it brings back so many memories.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: (Fondles the dress feebly)
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I love it... Thank you, Orchid. You seem... exhausted.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Thank you... so much.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Don't mention it. After you try it on today, I'll bring it back and work on the collar with some laces. It'll be finished soon.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Tomorrow, you'll wear it and marry Jerry.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: That's great... but I'm sorry. I can't... I can't wear it.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Don't be silly. This dress was made for you and for that moment.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Tomorrow, with everyone's blessings, Jerry and you will become husband and wife while you wear this dress.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: You'll have a champagne tower, a balloon arch, and cookies all day long. When everyone walks past you tomorrow, they'll gasp in admiration: Oh, what a beautiful bride.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Orchid...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Right from the start, I never expected you to finish it... I thought that... I wouldn't have to turn him down again if you didn't finish.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I turned him down... so many times. I couldn't bring myself to do it again.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: What you said is so beautiful... If only we could bring everything to a stop then... but I... I can't be so selfish.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I... I'm very thankful for your work, but please... please don't finish this dress. I can't marry him... I can't.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I know how you feel. All brides feel like this before a wedding.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But you can't back down in the face of those emotions. You two love each other deeply, don't you?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: This isn't backing down...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Orchid... I love papercutting... but... I don't like making the final snip.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: If I mess it up... It can't be fixed. If I can't bear the responsibility... then I should set the scissors down... and stop.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: (Holds the girl's hands) Penny... You're wrong. You want to see it finished, don't you? If you quit now, it will never be finished.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: It won't be finished, but there will still be a future. Whether it's good or bad... I don't know, but it's enough. There's still time. He can still find someone else.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Jerry will regret this the rest of his life. All because you're giving up now, Penny.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Right, it'll really weigh on him... but he won't be bound by our vows. He'll get better in the end... I hope he will.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Have you made up your mind?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Yes. Please help me. I... I can't bring myself to turn him down myself... and see him that sad.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Alright, Penny.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: That night...
Darling, I have some bad news. Penny never wanted to see you finished.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Does she like you? Yes, she does. Does she want you, though? No, she doesn't.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Looks like I've wasted a lot of energy on something that I should never have gotten myself mixed up in.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I could finish you and keep you... and no one would know...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But what point is there in doing that?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Phew—
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: (Picks up the pair of scissors on the desk)
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: That's why... I'm sorry, my darling.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Under the moonlight, a cold ray of light is reflected on the pair of scissors held high. Just like a cruel, merciless bolt from the blue, it tears the beautiful wedding dress on the hanger asunder, splitting it into two halves.
I can't finish you.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Two weeks later...
No, how could you cut it up?!
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: I've already done it. Another glass of whisky, Joe? Thanks.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I really regretted doing this, especially when Jerry found out the next day that I didn't finish the dress.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Was he mad about it?
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: I wish he was, but he wasn't.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Did he say anything?
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: Not a thing. All he did was nod and leave.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Well, that sounds terrible.
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: You know what made it worse? Penny passed away on the day the wedding was supposed to be held. I didn't go to her funeral, because I didn't know if I could stand to look Jerry in the eye.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But that was over two weeks ago. Why are you here drowning your sorrows now?
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: Because Jerry paid me a visit this morning.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: What did he say?
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: That he's leaving.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Before he left, he gave me a pair of scissors. He said it was a present Penny once gave him. He wanted to give them to me at the funeral, but I didn't show, and I'd been avoiding him since, so...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: He had no choice but to drop in on you.
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: Sure enough. Hmm, this glass is all gone too. Get me another?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I think you're drinking a little too much.
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: You know how well I hold my liquor.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: When we said our goodbyes, I tried to comfort the boy and tell him to get back on his feet. It's what Penny would've wanted.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But he said to me...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But, Orchid... When the sun sets on someone, it doesn't matter how many stars there are in the sky. They can't help him out of this long night.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: That filled me with regret. I shouldn't have cut the dress up. I should've pushed Penny to go ahead with the wedding. Then maybe Jerry would've felt better.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But you didn't do that.
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: Because I wanted to run away, again, and Penny gave me a good excuse to do it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: The truth is, every moment I spent with Penny tormented me. I never felt so clearly just how life slips away from somebody, bit by bit.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: (Trembling) It scares me... I tried to hold it in and to act normal in front of people.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But I can't help but wonder when I'm alone: What if that was me in the bed?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I have Oripathy, too!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: (Holds Orchid's hand)
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: So, once again, I crumbled. Once again, I ran away. Once again, I didn't see things through.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Another glass for you, Orchid?
attributes.name: Human Resources Operator

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: (Raises glass)
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: To Jerry and Penny, to dreams and failure, to that stinking old bastard Boyd...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: To life and death.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: (Finishes in a single gulp)
attributes.name: Orchid
